column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The Ministry of Health has announced the discovery a new COVID-19. ------According to the Ministry of Health
column6: who was diagnosed with the coronavirus had traveled from France on a flight from South Korea to Cambodia. The man arrived in Phnom Penh on May 24
column7: 2020 and was diagnosed on June 6.------It is believed he was self-isolating in Sen Sok and was tested 13 days after arriving by Institute Pasteur.------This is the 126th case found in Cambodia
column8: with 123 cases cured and 3 people undergoing treatment. ------KBN
